properties.name: autoCorrect
properties.description: Controls automatic correction in inputted text. Support by browser varies.

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Indicates that the input should have a border.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the textarea (supports DaisyUI).

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: The disabled state of the textarea.

properties.name: enterkeyhint
properties.description: A hint to the browser for which enter key to display.

properties.name: feedback
properties.description: Feedback to render below the input.

properties.name: inputId
properties.description: The ID of the input element.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The text to display within the label.

properties.name: maxLength
properties.description: The maximum number of characters allowed in the textarea.

properties.name: minLength
properties.description: The minimum number of characters required in the textarea.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The placeholder text for the textarea.

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: The readonly state of the textarea.

properties.name: required
properties.description: A value is required for the form to be submittable.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: The number of visible text lines for the textarea.

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Emitted when the input loses focus.

events.name: inputChange
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes.

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Emitted when the input gains focus.

examples.basic:
<modus-wc-textarea
        aria-label="Textarea input"
        auto-correct=${ifDefined(args['auto-correct'])}
        ?bordered=${args.bordered}
        custom-class=${ifDefined(args['custom-class'])}
        enterkeyhint=${ifDefined(args.enterkeyhint)}
        ?disabled=${args.disabled}
        .feedback=${args.feedback}
        input-aria-invalid=${ifDefined(args['input-aria-invalid'])}
        input-id=${ifDefined(args['input-id'])}
        input-tab-index=${ifDefined(args['input-tab-index'])}
        label=${ifDefined(args.label)}
        max-length=${ifDefined(args['max-length'])}
        min-length=${ifDefined(args['min-length'])}
        name=${ifDefined(args.name)}
        placeholder=${ifDefined(args.placeholder)}
        ?readonly=${args.readonly}
        ?required=${args.required}
        rows=${ifDefined(args.rows)}
        size=${ifDefined(args.size)}
        spellcheck=${ifDefined(args.spellcheck)}
        .value=${args.value}
      ></modus-wc-textarea>

scripts.title: Basic Usage
scripts.code: <modus-wc-textarea autoCorrect="example-autoCorrect" enterkeyhint="example-enterkeyhint" feedback="example-feedback" inputId="example-inputId" inputTabIndex="example-inputTabIndex" label="example-label" maxLength="example-maxLength" minLength="example-minLength" name="example-name" rows="example-rows"></modus-wc-textarea>
